title: Jacob: 'Everybody's allowed to cry'
creator_credit: Lyn Bugden, Australian Film Commission and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: A moving documentation of the life of a small boy about to face his sixth major operation in six years. Raises questions of care for the hospitalised, the rights of the patient and family, and the emotional requirements of people reliant on technology for life support. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
